articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Putin warns West of nuclear war risk, says Moscow can hit Western targets - The Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: Russian President Vladimir Putin warns that the West's threats increase the actual risk of nuclear war, and urges NATO countries not to send troops to Ukraine.
